package.name: rosduct
package.description: ROSduct, the duct of ROS messages. ROSduct acts as a proxy to expose ROS topics, services and parameters from a remote roscore into a local roscore via the [rosbridge protocol](https://github.com/RobotWebTools/rosbridge_suite/blob/develop/ROSBRIDGE_PROTOCOL.md).
package.author: Sammy Pfeiffer
